messages.title: A Caring Economy
messages.content: Labour will take urgent action on the climate emergency and rebuild our public services, putting people before privilege.

messages.title: Get the housing in order
messages.content: A green industrial revolution. 1 million new homes.

messages.title: NHS not for sale
messages.content: We will defend our NHS from a sell-off to Trump.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will get Brexit sorted within six months. We'll secure a good deal for working people and give you the final say.
We will rebuild our public services by investing in education and stopping the privatisation of the NHS.
We will tackle the climate emergency by kick starting a green industrial revolution.
Labour's plan for real change involves taking urgent action on the climate crisis and reinvesting in public services.
Labour will stop the privatisation of the NHS and ensure it is not sold off to Trump.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will get Brexit sorted within six months. We'll secure a good deal for working people and give you the final say.
issues.economy: Labour's plan for real change involves taking urgent action on the climate crisis and reinvesting in public services.
issues.education: We will rebuild our public services by investing in education
issues.environment: Labour will take urgent action on the climate emergency and we will kick start a green industrial revolution.
issues.health: We will defend our NHS from a sell-off to Trump and stop the privatisation of the NHS.

housing.content: A green industrial revolution. 1 million new homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I love our community and have spent my working life fighting for social justice, equality and workers' rights.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fighting for social justice, equality and workers' rights.

endorsements.endorsement: Kim will be a strong voice for Liverpool Riverside - she has the vision and passion to deliver real change.

leaflet.additionalNotes: My pledges to you are: to rebuild public services, address the climate emergency with a green industrial revolution, protect workers' rights, challenge all forms of discrimination, fight for justice for all.
